attributes.action: remember that charity begins at home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and to stop giving our taxes to the third world countries when the old and unemployed are struggling to pay for the heating bills and to fill there cars up with fuel to get to work, to pay Even more taxes. charity

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
